participant_abstract.sent: This final meeting included a prototype presentation by the design team.
They showed two examples that fulfilled the design standards we devised at the last meeting and after a discussion we chose an attractive yellow block with oversize black scroll-esqe buttons.
While the underlying technology isn't cutting edge, the design itself is rather unusual, approachable and refreshing.
Following the design presentation where they delineated the substances and manufacturing techniques to be used, I briefly introduced an evaluation metric.
Then, using the white board, I incorporated the marketing concerns brought up in the earlier meeting and as a group we judged the prototype on how well it adhered to these issues.
Overall, the evaluation result was 1.88 with 1 being best and 7 being worst.
The last order of business was filling out the manufacturing spreadsheet to discover the production price per unit which, due to the design choices, came in =A32 under the =A312.50.

participant_decisions.sent: We chose the chunkier, less fruity prototype.
We made judgements about the success of the prototype.
We filled out the manufacturing spreadsheet.

participant_problems.sent: There were no problems and this meeting moved along very swiftly and efficiently.
